EMODnetWFS 1.0.0

    • emodnetwfs

Get EMODnet WFS layers

Source: R/layers.R
emodnet_get_layers.Rd

Get EMODnet WFS layers

emodnet_get_layers(
  wfs = NULL,
  service = "seabed_habitats_individual_habitat_map_and_model_datasets",
  service_version = "2.0.0",
  layers,
  crs = 4326,
  reduce_layers = FALSE,
  suppress_warnings = FALSE
)

Arguments

wfs

A `WFSClient` R6 object with methods for interfacing an OGC Web Feature Service.
service

the EMODnet OGC WFS service name. Defaults to the EMODnet Seabed Habitats WFS `"seabed_habitats_individual_habitat_map_and_model_datasets"`. For available services, see `emodnet_wfs`.
service_version

the WFS service version. Defaults to "2.0.0".
layers

a character vector of layer names. To get info on layers, including `layer_name` use `emodnet_get_wfs_info()`
crs

integer. An EPSG code for the outpur crs. Defaults to 4326, corresponsing to `"+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs"`
reduce_layers

whether to reduce output layers to a single `sf` object.
suppress_warnings

logical. Whether to suppress messages of layer download failures.

Value

If `reduce_layers = FALSE` (default), a list of `sf` objects, one element for each layer. Any layers for which download was unsuccessful will be NULL. If `reduce_layers = TRUE`, all layers are reduced (if possible) to a single `sf` containing data for all layers. `NULL` layers are ignored.

Examples

emodnet_get_layers(layers = c("dk003069", "dk003070"))

#> Loading ISO 19139 XML schemas...
#> Loading ISO 19115 codelists...
#> ✔ WFS client created succesfully
#> ℹ Service: 'https://ows.emodnet-seabedhabitats.eu/emodnet_open_maplibrary/wfs'
#> ℹ Version: '2.0.0'
#> ℹ crs transformed from 3857 to 4326
#> ℹ crs transformed from 3857 to 4326
#> $dk003069
#> Simple feature collection with 82 features and 8 fields

emodnet_get_layers(layers = c("dk003069", "dk003070"), reduce_layers = TRUE)

#> ✔ WFS client created succesfully
#> ℹ Service: 'https://ows.emodnet-seabedhabitats.eu/emodnet_open_maplibrary/wfs'
